11.content:
You had recently appeared on iCarly and since then you and carly had become really good friends and you were getting to know each other. One day you were hanging out at carly's place.

"So tell me, what is your most embarrassing secret?" asked Carly.

"What, I'm not telling you" You responded.

"Oh, come on, tell me" Carly prodded you.

"OK, I'm scared of being tickled." You reluctantly admit.

"What?" Carly asked, sounding surprised and confused at the same time.

"Don't laugh" You say as your face blushes bright red.

"Don't worry, I know a cure for your tickling fetish" said Carly.

"What that?" You ask, a little worried.

"Tickle Fight!" Carly yelled before she jumped on top of you and began tickling your ribs.

"HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HEY STOP THAT HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA HAHAHAHAHAHA" You laugh, taken by surprise by the sudden tickling.

"I don't think Carly would like us raiding her fridge like this" you say as Sam leads you down stairs to the kitchen.

"There's nothing good in the fridge, I already checked, but lets look in the cupboards" she says, sounding like she does this kind of thing all the time. She gets down on her hands and knees, crawling half way into the cupboard. "Ok, I found some chips, but I think I'm stuck" she says as she tries to back out of the cupboard.

"Not sorry enough, but you will be" she says as she takes of your socks. You try desprately to crawl away, but burst out laughing and can only pound your fists on the floor as she tickles your bare feet. Just when you think things can't get any worse, she...
12121.title: breaks free

13.content: two months ago you appeared on a webcast of iCarly that helped it reach its most viewership ever. you had become great friends with Carly, Sam, and Freddie and began appearing on iCarly more and more frequently. one night after a webcast, you had to get home. after saying goodbye to the crew, you ran down to the lobby. in the lobby it was dark and there was no one there except for a girl who looked about your age standing near the door. as you got closer to the door, you realized the girl was Mandy, iCarly's biggest and craziest fanatic. before you could try and run out the door, Mandy knocked you out with some weird spray. when you came to, you looked around and saw you were in the basement. you tried to stretch before you realized you were standing with your hands tied to a pipe above your head. then Mandy came in. "hey, my name's Mandy and I know who you are. you're that guy from iCarly, you can help me get a permanent spot on iCarly. so will you please help me? I won't take no for an answer." said Mandy talking a mile a minute, as usual. "no, you're too crazy. now untie me." you reply. "please?" begged Mandy. "no" you reply sternly. "oh well, I geuss we'll have to do it the hard way. I know everything about you including where you're most ticklish at." said Mandy as she pulled up your shirt exposing your stomach. "you wouldn't?" you challenged. "I would and I will." said Mandy"the only question is what to tickle with". Mandy then reached down and revealed a bucket full of tickling tools. "now, what should I use to tickle your tummy?" said Mandy before she began tickling your belly with
